tool_description: Optimizes inventory item placement across warehouse bins using algorithms that consider item characteristics, bin constraints, picking efficiency, and storage rules.

items_list.description: List of SKUs to be placed in warehouse

priority_items.description: High-priority SKUs that should be placed in accessible locations

zone_restrictions.description: Zone types to exclude from placement

optimization_strategy.description: Strategy for placement: space_efficiency, pick_time, balanced

allow_splitting.description: Allow splitting quantities across multiple bins

consolidate_similar.description: Try to place similar items in nearby locations

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: items_list and quantities_list must have the same length.
Invalid quantities: All quantities must be positive integers.
Invalid optimization_strategy: Must be one of [space_efficiency, pick_time, balanced].
Unknown SKUs: Some items in items_list do not exist in the product catalog.
Insufficient capacity: Not enough available bin space for the requested items.
Invalid zone_restrictions: Specified zones do not exist in the warehouse.
usage: Provide items_list and quantities_list with equal lengths. Optionally specify priority_items, zone_restrictions, optimization_strategy, allow_splitting, and consolidate_similar preferences.

placement_plan.description: Array of placement instructions with SKU, quantity, and bin assignments

warnings.description: Any placement warnings or suboptimal conditions
